comments.body:
ulrichard@zeroid.bit
Nope, a small place in Guangdong near Taiwan, every year many Taifuns pass here like in the southern region of USA recently... Also in German Kanton means Guangzhou or member states of the Swiss Confederation, but it sounds more like Guangdong ;)
@nekololi: It's from the last act. (episode) of PLUTO by Naoki Urasawa ;)
